title: At turnings, width of ramp mentioned above shall be enhanced/increased for smooth maneuvering as per the sketch of Annexure 23 appended herewith
clause_text: At turnings, width of ramp mentioned above shall be enhanced/increased for smooth maneuvering as per the sketch of Annexure 23 appended herewith. The gradient of the ramp shall not be more than 1 in 8. Separate provision for ingress & egress shall be made.

source_pdf.text_snippet: At turnings, width of ramp mentioned above shall be enhanced/increased for smooth maneuvering as per the sketch of Annexure 23 appended herewith.
